_.comment: Background color for danger actions or messages (red.60).

strong.comment: Strong background color for danger actions or messages (red.70).

stronger.comment: Stronger background color for danger actions or messages (red.80).

strongest.comment: Strongest background color for danger actions or messages (red.90).

weak.comment: Weak background color for danger actions or messages (red.40).

weaker.comment: Weaker background color for danger actions or messages (red.20).

weakest.comment: Weakest background color for danger actions or messages (red.10).
Weakest background color for decorative purposes (purple.10).

strong.comment: Strong background color for neutral elements (gray.70).

stronger.comment: Stronger background color for neutral elements (gray.80).

strongest.comment: Strongest background color for neutral elements (gray.90).

weak.comment: Weak background color for neutral elements (gray.40).

weaker.comment: Weaker background color for neutral elements (gray.20).

weakest.comment: Weakest background color for neutral elements (gray.10).

_.comment: Background color for primary actions or messages (blue.60).

strong.comment: Strong background color for primary actions or messages (blue.70).

stronger.comment: Stronger background color for primary actions or messages (blue.80).

strongest.comment: Strongest background color for primary actions or messages (blue.90).

weak.comment: Weak background color for primary actions or messages (blue.40).

weaker.comment: Weaker background color for primary actions or messages (blue.20).

weakest.comment: Weakest background color for primary actions or messages (blue.10)

weak.comment: Weak background color for success elements (green.40).

weakest.comment: Weakest background color for success elements (green.10).

weak.comment: Weak background color for warning elements (yellow.40).

weakest.comment: Weakest background color for warning elements (yellow.10).
